channel.title: ZexCo Banner/Logo/Tag Contest (Prize $$ Involved)
channel.description:
[b]Mission:[/b] Come up with a banner, logo, and a tag: - Banner = 468x60 - Subtext on banner: "Technologies" http://www.syi.cc/viewtopic.php?id=64527 (If you have an account there) See there soon, so try and not to merge the text layer if you can, otherwise "Technologies" is okay I guess. - Logo = 100x100 (Transparent [b]upon request[/b], ie. I like the look of it and determine it will look better in a theme transparent) - Tag = 300x25 - Matching themes. - Text must be "ZexCo"
Edit: Maybe one of those little punbb tags aswell? http://img88.imageshack.us/img88/4863/meatspin6zg.png <- Found that in the SYI Logo topic, basically like that kind off. (Must go with other themes. The text for this would be "ZexCo" then "Technologies"
No specific colours, etc. at the moment. As of now, whatever the banner looks like will likely be the theme of the site.
You have until the end of this month. Any date changes will be posted here. The prize money will be from $10-15 unless I get any more cash to dish out. - To be paid with paypal.
Any questions just ask.[br][size=1]Posted on: 17-06-2007, 16:25:31[/size][hr]Bump

item.title: ZexCo Banner/Logo/Tag Contest (Prize $$ Involved)
item.dc:creator: @Uriko Uriko
item.description:
@Uriko wrote:

Mission: Come up with a banner, logo, and a tag:

  • Banner = 468x60
  • Subtext on banner: “Technologies” http://www.syi.cc/viewtopic.php?id=64527 (If you have an account there) See there soon, so try and not to merge the text layer if you can, otherwise “Technologies” is okay I guess.
  • Logo = 100x100 (Transparent upon request, ie. I like the look of it and determine it will look better in a theme transparent)
  • Tag = 300x25
  • Matching themes.
  • Text must be “ZexCo”

Edit: Maybe one of those little punbb tags aswell?
http://img88.imageshack.us/img88/4863/meatspin6zg.png <- Found that in the SYI Logo topic, basically like that kind off. (Must go with other themes. The text for this would be “ZexCo” then “Technologies”

No specific colours, etc. at the moment. As of now, whatever the banner looks like will likely be the theme of the site.

You have until the end of this month. Any date changes will be posted here.
The prize money will be from $10-15 unless I get any more cash to dish out.

  • To be paid with paypal.

Any questions just ask.[br][size=1]Posted on: 17-06-2007, 16:25:31[/size][hr]Bump
